title: Breakingviews TV: Xeroxed deal
text:
Breakingviews TV: Xeroxed deal 10:35pm IST - 04:07
Antony Currie and Richard Beales talk about Xerox’s latest agreement with Carl Icahn and Darwin Deason. The copying pioneer has terminated a sale to Fujifilm, its CEO is leaving and most directors have quit. The question is whether the activist investors can print a better trade. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Antony Currie and Richard Beales talk about Xerox’s latest agreement with Carl Icahn and Darwin Deason. The copying pioneer has terminated a sale to Fujifilm, its CEO is leaving and most directors have quit. The question is whether the activist investors can print a better trade.
